thread.title: Nelly to DJ this Toronto bar's free anniversary party
thread.title_full: Nelly to DJ this Toronto bar's free anniversary party

author: Karen Doradea
title: Nelly to DJ this Toronto bar's free anniversary party
text:
Toronto’s beloved country bar, Paris Texas, is celebrating its second anniversary next week with a very special, Grammy Award-winning guest. Hip-hop legend Nelly will be in attendance, and here’s how you can join in the celebration — for free.
Paris Texas’ anniversary Mark your calendars for July 31, as the popular King Street destination will welcome everyone to celebrate its significant accomplishment.
The country sports bar is turning two this month, and they’re going all out to mark the milestone in true Southern style: big, bold, and unforgettable.
What to expect Get ready to drink, dance and celebrate alongside Nelly, who will be DJing throughout the evening for the two-year celebration.
He’s expected to bring the 2000s heat, and this is one night you don’t want to miss.
Known for blending his hip-hop sounds with country, Nelly has collaborated with artists like Florida Georgia Line in the past, so this team-up feels like a match made in heaven.
Ready to party? Luckily for you, the party is open to everyone 19+ and it’s free to attend.
All you need to do is get your tickets online via Eventbrite and start planning your outfit for the evening.
Doors open right at 9 p.m., and knowing how busy King Street gets, you might want to arrive early.
See ya’ll there!
Paris Texas’ second anniversary When: Thursday, July 31, 2025
Time: 9 p.m. to 2 a.m.
Where: Paris Texas — 461 King St. W.
Cost: Free
